PARAMETER.NAME: DB_VERSION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: HADOOP_CUSTOM_JARS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true') AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_YARN
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true') AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: FS_DEFAULT_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true'

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_TRACKER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DB_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN'))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS == 'true') AND (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: NAMENODE_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND USE_KRB == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND USE_KRB == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_KRB == 'true' AND USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_KRB == 'true' AND USE_KEYTAB == 'true' USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: KEYTAB_PATH
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_KRB == 'true' AND USE_KEYTAB == 'true' AND USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: HADOOP_USER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_CUSTOMER
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: This function only apply between HDP and Teradata

PARAMETER.NAME: SPECIFIC_PARAMS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_COMMANDLINE=='true') AND (USE_SPEED_PARALLEL=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_ADDITION_PARAM
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_COMMANDLINE=='true') AND (USE_SPEED_PARALLEL=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SPECIFIC_ADDITION_PARAM
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_COMMANDLINE=='true') AND (USE_SPEED_PARALLEL=='true') AND (USE_ADDITION_PARAM=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_MAP_MEMORY_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_REDUCE_MEMORY_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPREDUCE_MAP_MEMORY_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_MEMORY == 'true') AND (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPREDUCE_REDUCE_MEMORY_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_MEMORY == 'true') AND (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

PARAMETER.NAME: YARN_APP_MAPREDUCE_AM_RESOURCE_MB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_MEMORY == 'true') AND (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_KRB=='true') AND (USE_JAVAAPI=='true') AND (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')
